name: @mm-snap/workers
description: Snap Web Workers for the MetaMask extension.

scripts.build: yarn build:prep && yarn build:ts && yarn build:bundle
scripts.build:ts: tsc --project . && cp dist-temp/* dist && rm dist/PluginWorker*
scripts.build:prep: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist-temp && rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf dist-temp/*

author: Erik Marks <rekmarks@protonmail.com>
